content.description: Thors Hammer is on a boulder down hill and to the right when facing the Three Amigos boulder. This boulder is unique as the rock is smooth and featured with pinch like dykes going horizontal. Thors hammer SDS and follows up the middle working the Dyke to the top crux section. Mantle and walk off the back.
content.location: Down and north from the Three Amigos boulder

content.description: This is actually unique schist like granite rock that has been eroded down to be hard smooth rock. This boulder is by the Ugly Duckling Boulder down hill a few feet from it to the northeast. The top out actually looks like just a smooth boulder in the ground on the hill side. Thors Hammer follows the middle dyke feature up and pulls the mantle.
